# inputImage

**Instance Property**

The image to use as an input image.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputImage: CIImage? { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **color0**: The first color to use for the color ramp.
- **color1**: The second color to use for the color ramp.

items.description: The first color to use for the color ramp.
items.name: color0

items.description: The second color to use for the color ramp.
items.name: color1
